$interpreted:
Puggi: Huff~ Puff~ What is this freaky looking place?
Food and water are nowhere to be found too.
Puggi: Jasus, that fatty Pang sure knows how to hide his tracks...
Puggi: Hmm? This smell...

Puggi: Ohhh! Food lying around randomly in a cave! 
My plot armor once again carried me through the hard times!
Puggi: Time to dig in!

Hapless Illegal Miner: Hey man~ this mining location is darn good.
It's well-hidden and you don't run into Bears.

Newlywed Illegal Miner: After we're done with our lunch break,
we should speed up so we can catch up to schedule.
Newlywed Illegal Miner: ... Wait a sec. What is that thing doing!?

Hapless Illegal Miner: Our lunch!
This damn stupid bird ate our lunch!
Puggi: Eh, if it's something important, you shouldn't leave it lying around like that. You've learned your lesson, right? Don't do it next time.
Newlywed Illegal Miner: That lunch box was the first one made by my newlywed wife! I've been looking forward to eating it this entire morning!
Puggi: Is that my fault?

Newlywed Illegal Miner: Stinkin bird brain.
You eat our lunch boxes, we'll eat you!
Puggi: SOS! SOS! I'm gonna get murdered!
Hapless Illegal Miner: Holy cow, that's a giant Golem!
Puggi: Hoho~ Are you a summon that is exclusive to a protagonist like me?
Puggi: You puny miners, you had the gall to mess with me back there. Now, it's payback time!

Puggi: You're a strong fighter.
I'll let you be my minion!
Golemwalt: Grrrooouuu?

Puggi: There are a lot of benefits for you if you follow me.
First and foremost, you will be popular among the ladies, just like me~
Golemwalt: Grrrooouuu?

Puggi: I'm Puggi. I'll be your boss from now on.
What's your name?
Golemwalt: Grou Grrrooouuu?

Puggi: ... Jeez, I wasn't expecting you to be the talkative type, but you're even worse than Pang. He would at least shoot me some snappy remarks. 
Your only reply seems to be just "Grrrooouuu"...
Golemwalt: Grou~?
Puggi: Oh, Pang? He's my partner. I've been looking for him for days already.

Puggi: He's very muscular, has long hair and doesn't really look human. Oh, and he always looks grumpy, the "everyone in the world owes me money" 
kind. Have you seen him before?
Puggi: What? Are you taking me to where Pang is?
Puggi: That's awesome! Pang, buddy, here I come~~

Model.Text:
Huff~ Puff~ What is this freaky looking place?
Food and water are nowhere to be found too.
Jasus, that fatty Pang sure knows how to hide his tracks...
Hmm? This smell...

Ohhh! Food lying around randomly in a cave! 
My plot armor once again carried me through the hard times!
Time to dig in!

Hey man~ this mining location is darn good.
It's well-hidden and you don't run into Bears.

After we're done with our lunch break,
we should speed up so we can catch up to schedule.
... Wait a sec. What is that thing doing!?

Our lunch!
This damn stupid bird ate our lunch!
Eh, if it's something important, you shouldn't leave it lying around like that. You've learned your lesson, right? Don't do it next time.
That lunch box was the first one made by my newlywed wife! I've been looking forward to eating it this entire morning!
Is that my fault?

Stinkin bird brain.
You eat our lunch boxes, we'll eat you!
SOS! SOS! I'm gonna get murdered!
Holy cow, that's a giant Golem!
Hoho~ Are you a summon that is exclusive to a protagonist like me?
You puny miners, you had the gall to mess with me back there. Now, it's payback time!

You're a strong fighter.
I'll let you be my minion!
Grrrooouuu?

There are a lot of benefits for you if you follow me.
First and foremost, you will be popular among the ladies, just like me~
Grrrooouuu?

I'm Puggi. I'll be your boss from now on.
What's your name?
Grou Grrrooouuu?

... Jeez, I wasn't expecting you to be the talkative type, but you're even worse than Pang. He would at least shoot me some snappy remarks. 
Your only reply seems to be just "Grrrooouuu"...
Grou~?
Oh, Pang? He's my partner. I've been looking for him for days already.

He's very muscular, has long hair and doesn't really look human. Oh, and he always looks grumpy, the "everyone in the world owes me money" 
kind. Have you seen him before?
What? Are you taking me to where Pang is?
That's awesome! Pang, buddy, here I come~~
